description: This file contains inline functions and macros for managing a linked list data structure, including initialization, insertion, removal, iteration, and internal utility functions. It defines the core logic for a singly linked list with a dummy root node, supporting operations like insert head/tail, remove head, and iterator-based insertion and removal.

methods.name: void ds_list_node_insert_after(ds_list_t * list,ds_list_node_t * after,ds_list_node_t * node)
methods.description: Inserts a node after the specified node in the list.

methods.name: ds_list_node_t * ds_list_node_remove_after(ds_list_t * list,ds_list_node_t * after)
methods.description: Removes the node immediately following the specified node.

methods.name: ds_list_node_t * ds_list_node_next(ds_list_node_t * cur)
methods.description: Returns the next node in the list after the given node.

methods.name: void ds_list_node_insert_head(ds_list_t * list,ds_list_node_t * node)
methods.description: Inserts a node at the head of the list.

methods.name: void ds_list_node_insert_tail(ds_list_t * list,ds_list_node_t * node)
methods.description: Inserts a node at the tail of the list.

methods.name: void __ds_list_init(ds_list_t * list,size_t cof)
methods.description: Initializes a list with a specified capacity/function offset.

methods.name: bool ds_list_is_empty(ds_list_t * list)
methods.description: Checks if the list is empty.

methods.name: void * ds_list_next(ds_list_t * list,void * curr)
methods.description: Returns the next element in the list from a given current.

methods.name: void * ds_list_head(ds_list_t * list)
methods.description: Returns the head element of the list.

methods.name: void * ds_list_tail(ds_list_t * list)
methods.description: Returns the tail element of the list.

methods.name: void ds_list_insert_head(ds_list_t * list,void * data)
methods.description: Inserts data at the head of the list.

methods.name: void ds_list_insert_tail(ds_list_t * list,void * data)
methods.description: Inserts data at the tail of the list.

methods.name: void ds_list_insert_after(ds_list_t * list,void * after,void * data)
methods.description: Inserts data after a specified node in the list.

methods.name: void * ds_list_remove_after(ds_list_t * list,void * after)
methods.description: Removes the node after the specified node and returns its data.

methods.name: void * ds_list_remove_head(ds_list_t * list)
methods.description: Removes the head element of the list.

methods.name: void * ds_list_ifirst(ds_list_iter_t * iter,ds_list_t * list)
methods.description: Initializes an iterator to the first element in the list.

methods.name: void * ds_list_inext(ds_list_iter_t * iter)
methods.description: Returns the next element in the list during iteration.

methods.name: void * ds_list_iinsert(ds_list_iter_t * iter,void * data)
methods.description: Inserts data at the current iterator position.

methods.name: void * ds_list_iremove(ds_list_iter_t * iter)
methods.description: Removes the current node at the iterator position.

methods.name: void ds_list_node_iinsert(ds_list_iter_t * iter,ds_list_node_t * node)
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: ds_list_ifirst
ctags.pattern: /^static inline void* ds_list_ifirst(ds_list_iter_t* iter, ds_list_t* list)$/

ctags.name: ds_list_node_insert_after
ctags.pattern: /^static inline void ds_list_node_insert_after(ds_list_t* list, ds_list_node_t* after, ds_list_nod/

ctags.name: ds_list_node_insert_head
ctags.pattern: /^static inline void ds_list_node_insert_head(ds_list_t* list, ds_list_node_t* node)$/

ctags.name: ds_list_node_insert_tail
ctags.pattern: /^static inline void ds_list_node_insert_tail(ds_list_t* list, ds_list_node_t* node)$/

ctags.name: ds_list_node_remove_after
ctags.pattern: /^static inline ds_list_node_t* ds_list_node_remove_after(ds_list_t* list, ds_list_node_t* after)$/
